official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify
		  that wages paid to unauthorized aliens may not be deducted from gross income,
		  and for other purposes.

term.#tail:
means all
				remuneration for employment, including the cash value of all remuneration

text.#text:
For
				the purposes of this paragraph, the term

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not apply with respect to wages paid to such employee.

				entity is participating in the E-Verify Program described in

text.#text:
In the case of any examination of a return in connection

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not commence an audit or other investigation of a taxpayer solely on the
				basis of a deduction taken under this section by reason of this
				paragraph.

quote.#text:
Any person or other entity that conducts any
			 hiring (or recruitment or referral) in a State or employs any individuals in a
			 State may elect to participate in the E-Verify Program.
